catalyst: The photocatalyst used in the experiment was Ru/TpPa-1, which is TpPa-1 (a ketoamine-based COF) loaded with different amounts of Ru NPs (Ruthenium nanoparticles).
co_catalyst: The co-catalyst used in the experiment is Ru nanoparticles (NPs).
light source: Xe lamp with a UV-cut filter and an IR-cut filter
